userestrict.head: Publication Rights/ Restrictions on Use
userestrict.p: Before publishing quotations or excerpts from any materials, permission must be obtained from the Special Collections Librarian/ Associate Curator of Rare Books and Manuscripts, and the holder of the copyright, if not the Rockefeller Library at Colonial Williamsburg.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Christopher Wren's Report to the Lords of the Treasury, 1716 Nov 14, Manuscript # 1953.6, John D. Rockefeller, Jr. Library, Colonial Williamsburg Foundation

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: Report from the Board of Works, signed by Wren, Sir John Vanbrugh, and Charles Dartiquenave, on rebuilding the Equerries' houses in the Great Mews, Charing Cross. Order for rebuilding on the verso signed by Robert Walpole, 1716 December 12.
